activities:
Overtone collects Personal Information directly from website visitors that 
request contact with regards to answering questions about our products and 
services, or enter information to register and receive marketing collateral, 
sign-up for informational seminars, and receive newsletters.  Overtone receives 
Personal Information indirectly from our customers that have received 
information directly from their customers (i.e. customer satisfaction survey 
responses, web company feedback forms).
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
